rows.label: tev040201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Uzoma about the wildlife of the Prone's homeworld.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Uzoma about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Uzoma about the Cavern Clan.

rows.label: tev040201_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Uzoma about the Ganglion.

rows.label: tev040201_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Uzoma what he will do next.

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Our world was home to beasts. Mighty beasts.
More ferocious than any on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Prone lived as one with beasts. Hunted them.
Gave thanks for nourishment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0003
rows.name: One beast called "dolphera" reminds me of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0004
rows.name:
It was giant fish with two long tentacles.
But dolphera was also quite wise.
Used terrain to sink many Prone ships.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0005
rows.name: I went on many dolphera hunts. But never killed one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0008
rows.name:
Ah! The Earth alien who is wise like dolphera speaks
with me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0009
rows.name:
My father spoke. Said Cavern Clan causes trouble for
Earth aliens. Just as they cause us trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0010
rows.name: They are cowards. Not fit to be called Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0011
rows.name:
We fought Cavern Clan in wars on our homeworld.
They killed many good friends with trickery.
Cowardly tactics. They are scum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0012
rows.name:
Now they are Ganglion dogs. They shame all Prone.
All to get more cowardly weapons. Hmph![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0013
rows.name:
Cavern Clan must die in name of honor.
Tree Clan will see it done![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0018
rows.name:
Many centuries we fight with Cavern Clan.
For 10,000 suns or more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0019
rows.name:
But Tree Clan is strong like Uzoma Vassago!
My people tamed vassago. And valdileo.
And many beasts besides.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0020
rows.name: We nearly put Cavern Clan to rout as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0021
rows.name:
This is why they allow Ganglion to shame them.
This is why they choose slavery![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0022
rows.name:
They are afraid to face us. Afraid to die as free Prone.
So they became dogs of Ganglion instead. Pah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0027
rows.name: Ganglion seeks warring planets like our homeworld.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0028
rows.name:
They choose side. Help that side win war.
Then decimate losers and subjugate winners.
All without shedding their own blood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0029
rows.name: This is how Ganglion gets strong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0030
rows.name:
They are cowards. But I will fight them to bitter end.
No other race will suffer like Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0035
rows.name:
Ganglion's army is destroyed?
Prone live in your Earth-alien city?
It is hard to believe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0036
rows.name:
Our first days here were hard. Cavern Clan tortured
us without mercy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0037
rows.name: We did not dare dream of peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0038
rows.name:
I miss my homeworld. I miss chasing beasts across
endless plains.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev040201_MSG0039
rows.name: But I am alive. And content. For this, I am thankful.[ST:wait ]
